meanings.definition: To prepare food by adding hot or spicy seasoning.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys deviling her eggs with a sprinkle of hot sauce.
meanings.sent2: The chef is deviling the chicken wings with a special spicy rub.
meanings.sent3: The kids found it funny when their dad started deviling the salad with extra pepper.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the deviling spices filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The secret to deviling the chili is to use a blend of fiery spices.

meanings.sent4: The deviling's sly grin gave away his mischievous intentions.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the deviling at the office who loves to pull pranks on coworkers.

meanings.sent4: The deviling of the kitchen effortlessly whipped up a gourmet meal.
